name: The Last Confession
description: Your name is Adam, a young man living in the wild west. You have had your fair share of ups and downs. Life in the west is not so bad, once you get familiar with the way of riding your life around here. But despite all your positiveness, a regret eats you up day and night. The love of your life Angela .. a woman you neither have means to impress, nor confidence to speak to. And today, she is leaving the town, perhaps forever. Thisis you last chance to confess your feelings to her. Can you make it count?
